thread.title: One Direction reveal Made In The A.M. tracklisting via Snapchat
thread.title_full: One Direction reveal Made In The A.M. tracklisting via Snapchat

title: One Direction reveal Made In The A.M. tracklisting via Snapchat
text:
One Direction reveal Made In The A.M. tracklisting via Snapchat One Direction reveal Made In The A.M. tracklisting via Snapchat 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
One Direction gave their fans a treat when they unveiled the 17 song titles on their upcoming album, Made In The A.M, on Snapchat. 
The boyband – Niall Horan, Liam Payne, Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson – took to the streaming service to tease out the information. Want to know the rest of the tracks on #MadeInTheAM ? Search: "OneDirection" on @Snapchat , and tune in tonight! pic.twitter.com/jMIxV1bbTx 
— One Direction (@onedirection) October 11, 2015 
First, the four-piece dropped the news about their new single, Perfect, on Twitter. Looks like the cat's out of the bag!!! Our next single is Perfect. Can't wait for you all to hear it! 
— Harry Styles. (@Harry_Styles) October 9, 2015 
The first clip on Snapchat showed Liam revealing that track number one is titled Hey Angel, with the second song being Drag Me Down. Hey Angel. Do you look at us and laugh, when we hold on to the past? 
— Harry Styles. (@Harry_Styles) October 9, 2015 
Other track titles that have emerged include Infinity, If I Could Fly, What A Feeling and I Want To Write You A Song. ICYMI: The guys revealed the track listing for Made in the A.M. this weekend! http://t.co/qYEj3RwRVN https://t.co/p1T0UiR6Ju 
— One Direction (@onedirection) October 12, 2015 
Made In The A.M., their fifth album, will be released on November 13. 
The regular version of the album will consist of 13 tracks, with the deluxe edition thought to have an additional four songs. 
Made in the A.M. is One Direction’s first album since Zayn Malik quit the band, and will likely be their last before the remaining band members embark on a temporary break in 2016. So this is the full tracklist for Made In The A.M. pic.twitter.com/UVHbZQT1ln Share article 
— ℓαяяу αf ✌ (@LarentsParadise) October 10, 2015 Promoted Stories
